pull.title: wallet: fix boost::get usage with boost 1.58

events.message:
wallet: fix boost::get usage with boost 1.58

Backport from master

events.body: This is a simple backport, but PR'ing here since it may not be straightforward to those currently facing the issue.

issue.title: invalid application of 'sizeof' to incomplete type 'boost::STATIC_ASSERTION_FAILURE<false>
wallet: fix boost::get usage with boost 1.58

issue.title: Build fails on ubuntu 16.04 with boost 1.58

events.body: Perfect for me on ubuntu 16.04, thank you !
